item.title: How Quiet Thriving Is Killing Your Culture
item.description: Most leaders never see the warning signs and don’t try to change the trajectory until it’s too late.

item.title: Mexicans Are Refusing to Spend This $50 Peso Bill
item.description: According to the Bank of Mexico (Banxico), around 12.9 million people are hoarding the Mexican $50 peso bill.

item.title: How Founders Can Find Innovation in the Ordinary
item.description: Most founders chase the next big thing while ignoring the 60-second headaches that quietly define their customers’ lives.

item.title: Receive This Amazon Text? Experts Warn It’s a Dangerous Phishing Scam
item.description: The fake messages are impersonating an Amazon product recall message.

item.title: How Artificial Intelligence Will Change Business Deals and Negotiating
item.description: Even if you aren’t very financially savvy, AI can help you make better deals.
